scripts.test: npm run test:auth:systemLogin && node ../helper/sleeper.js 5 && npm run test:auth:staticLogin
scripts.test:auth:systemLogin: node ../helper/sleeper.js 10 && npx wdio authenticator/systemLogin/configCustom.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio authenticator/systemLogin/configFiori.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio authenticator/systemLogin/configPlain.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio authenticator/systemLogin/configSapCloud.js
scripts.test:auth:staticLogin: node ../helper/sleeper.js 10 && npx wdio authenticator/staticLogin/configCustom.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio authenticator/staticLogin/configCustomViaConfig.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio authenticator/staticLogin/configFiori.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio authenticator/staticLogin/configPlain.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio authenticator/staticLogin/configSapCloud.js
